ask_bot_token:
ğŸ”‘ To continue, please send us your bot_token and bot_username in the following format:
<bot_token>&<bot_username>

Instructions:
1. Access @BotFather on Telegram and create a new bot.
2. Copy the bot_token and bot_username provided by @BotFather.
3. Send these two pieces of information in a message, separated by a & (e.g., 123456:ABC-DEF...&my_bot_username).

If you need assistance, please contact support.
